actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow any employer maintaining a defined benefit plan that is not a governmental plan to treat employee contributions as pretax employer contributions if picked up by the employer.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to expand the treatment of employee contributions as pretax employer contributions.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow any employer maintaining a defined benefit plan that is not a governmental plan to treat employee contributions as pretax employer contributions if picked up by the employer.
